column4: Can anyone help me, with an issue I'm having.  I mean I looked up thins, but it just seemed to really confuse me. o_o
I'm just trying to dual-boot both Xubuntu and Windows XP. . . and just the partitioning of the hard drive is where I get really confused.
if nobody helps you after 5 min, try channel #xubuntu (it's quieter) or the ubuntuforums website.
Okay, thank you.  If no one does help then I will do that. :)
